title: Account recovery
body: Guys I have a doubt. I sent a ticket to riot on 3rd December, 2016 regarding an unauthorised access on my account and its already been 5 days. After looking through the forums some people had mentioned they had to answer questions regarding their account for proving that your the member. I clicked on sending an account recovery ticket to them but it said I have to stay logged out of their website for security reasons and I got no option to fill out those details. Will riot send me a reply in which I have to fill them out or I just missed something?

replies.body:
I took a look at your tickets and it seems you need to first ensure you're **logged out** of your account from the [Riot Support site](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) (Be sure it says *Sign In* at the top-right of the page. Once you've done that, you can submit a new recovery ticket using [**this specific form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so we can assist you!

Let me know if you have any questions.
